#summary Instructions on how to install Open SAPI

=Manual Install Process=

1. Install WINE
{{{ 
sudo apt-get install wine
}}}

2. Change the default OS to Win2000 on WINE

3a. Install speech MSI file 
{{{
start SpeechFull.msi /QN 
}}}

3b. (Optional) - Install any additional speech engines

4. Add C++ runtime into c:\windows\system32

5. Install the server .exe into  Program Files.

6. Install the server wrapper into /usr/local/bin

7. Install the command line interface into /usr/local/bin

8. setup directories for the config files in /etc/osapi
